post.body: Hello World! Pretty cool P2P internet!

comment.body: @Kaffie: thanks for the correction, I guess I'm looking more from the marketing side, not the technical side. But you're right!
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: yep, testing around, just hoping I can give some inputs to avoid bad actors influencing and destroying this initiative

@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: honestly, I see no problem on forcing people to truly reveal their info, but before that this tool might need to build up some kind of validation mechanism. the rest I is educating people on what to share.
